short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover the top music streaming platforms to find your favorite artists, albums, and playlists.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Zene a free music app, the ultimate music experience that redefines the way you listen to your favorite tunes. Dive into a world of limitless music with our free app, offering ad-free access to over 1 billion songs, albums, playlists, podcasts, covers, remixes, and more.

🎵 Versatile Music Selection:
From chart-topping international artists to the latest trending songs and artists, Zene has it all. Immerse yourself in the diverse world of music, spanning genres like Hip Hop, K-Pop, Devotional, New Songs, Workout Music, Lo-Fi, Old Songs, Retro Music, Love Songs ❤️, and beyond.

🌟 Unparalleled Artists Lineup:
Discover and enjoy music from a stellar lineup of artists, including Hollywood, Bollywood celebs and many more.

🚫 Ad-Free Listening:
Say goodbye to interruptions! Zene provides ad-free streaming of songs, albums, playlists, podcasts, covers, remixes, and more.

📱 Offline Enjoyment:
Download your favorite MP3 songs directly within the app for unlimited offline playback. Take your music with you wherever you go, even without an internet connection.

🎧 Personalized Playlists:
Experience tailor-made playlists and song recommendations based on your music history. Zene understands your preferences and curates playlists just for you.

▶️  Music/Lyrics Videos:
Unlock a deeper level of music with Zene. Explore official music videos and lyric videos alongside your favorite songs. It's your all-access pass to a richer musical journey.

📜 Lyrics On-the-Go:
Sing along to your favorite songs with in-app lyrics, making your music experience even more engaging.

🔄 Seamless Audio-Video Switch:
Easily switch between audio and video modes for a dynamic and immersive listening experience.

🔄 Cross-Platform Sync:
Sync your playlists seamlessly from Spotify, Apple Music, and YouTube Music to enjoy a unified music library.

⌚ Smart Integration:
Utilize your smartwatch to cast and control playback on compatible Android devices, ensuring a convenient and connected music experience.

🌐 Multilingual Interface:
Enjoy Zene in your language! The app is available in English, Chinese, Spanish, Arabic, Portuguese, Hindi, Korean, Japanese, French, German, Russian and Indonesian, so you can experience your music the way you want.

Upgrade your music journey with Zene – where every beat, lyric, and melody is just a tap away. Download now and revolutionize your music listening experience!
